name: com.testmono.ads.mobile.mediation.chartboost
displayName: Google Mobile Ads Chartboost Mediation for Unity
keywords: vh-name:Google Mobile Ads Chartboost Mediation for Unity
description: The Google Mobile Ads mediation plugin for Chartboost package allows you to easily monetize your Unity apps for iOS and Android using Google's native iOS and Android Mobile SDKs via a unified C# API in Unity.

samples.description: Contains sample app to load and show Google ads mediaited through the Chartboost ad network.
